bioconda.name: bioconductor-seqpattern
bioconda.summary: Visualising oligonucleotide patterns and motif occurrences across a set of sorted sequences

biotools.summary: Visualising oligonucleotide patterns and sequence motifs occurrences across a large set of sequences centred at a common reference point and sorted by a user defined feature.

bioschemas.name: seqPattern
bioschemas.summary: Visualising oligonucleotide patterns and sequence motifs occurrences across a large set of sequences centred at a common reference point and sorted by a user defined feature.
